item.title: The Miner - Neutral Offensive
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Then this class needs serious buffs to give it better fakeclaim space or a way to aid BD more clearly, if you want to keep the conversion possibilities, because at the moment it can only barely fake a drunk log and it has no other protection from the court at day whatsoever. The occupy immunity only gives it a chance to claim butler/drunk/hunter. Hunter is already a tricky claim. He cannot occupy anyone, or poison the king and he cannot happy hour or consistently debauch people. He cannot claim miner, because in its current incarnation every sensible BD would execute all miner claims on sight.

I also disagree completely that scum should just be able to convert everything blindly with zero regard for target selection. They TOO need to apply social deduction for more than just finding the prince…, but that is another topic I suppose

item.description:
Because everything that doesn’t need conversion immunity (NK, Prince, King) should be convertible. It should be a loss for the Unseen/Cult to convert a neutral, but it just makes arbitrarily harder for Unseen/Cult.

item.title: The Miner - Neutral Offensive
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Why should this be convertible? There is already almost no reason BD wants this alive. Making this convertible just squashes that chance to zero. I also don’t see why his night skill needs a cooldown. He can at least fake a drunk log if that weren’t the case, although he cannot happy hour or step up for king.

item.description:
Time to bring out the old analysis machine-
First of all the format is a bit weird.
Another survivor neut ok

MemeReviewer:

Covered In Dirt - Appears as uknown.

Appears as unknown? Explain. Also this makes miner pretty confirmable , just a nitpick.

MemeReviewer:

Peek-a-boo! - Scare a player, preventing them from taking any action and revealing yourself to the target. If the player is Occupy Immune, they will target you. If your target attacks you, you become Death Immune. (Infinite uses)

confirmable:the return xd
also as nightx said. Occupy immune targets will just recieve a “someone tried to change your targey” message.

MemeReviewer:

The Explosives Expert - (Converted) Offensive

Doesnt have that much of a ring. How about something like the Detonator?
Also, (Converted) does this mean as cult they still become an Explosives Expert?

MemeReviewer:

Big Bang - Throw an explosive into the room, causing havoc amongst players. (Prevents all players from speaking / voting) (10 seconds) (1 use)

Miner now confirmed converted xd
I think it should act like dirt distraction tbh

MemeReviewer:

Explosion Extravaganza - Build a tunnel to another player’s house. If an unseen member visits that player the night after, he will be Night Immune. (1 day cooldown) (Infinite uses)

Who’ll be night immune

MemeReviewer:

Hot Stuff! - Put an explosive trap at a player’s house, if the player attempts to leave, they will be incapacitated.They will die in the following night. (2 day cooldown) (3 uses)

Ok slowdown. UNSEEN/cult GET 3 EXTRA KILLS AT MAX? UR KIDDING RIGHT? Like come on

I may or may not post a rework on this . You have a good concept , but there are many things i have wrong with its execution.
(What am I saying, I cant make good classes xd)
